features: Hydro Boost Face Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 50 Sunscreen provides all day quenching hydration for soft, supple skin. The hyaluronic acid moisturizer instantly hydrates for smoother skin and delivers radiant, healthy-looking skin in one week

Moisturizer with hydrating hyaluronic acid an essential hydrator found naturally in skin, glycerin for deeper hydration, and supercharged antioxidants including vitamin E, help fight against daily environmental aggressors

Gel cream is clinically proven to hydrate all day, the weightless, fast-absorbing daily gel-cream moisturizer quenches skin all day and delivers UVA/UVB protection that is invisible on all skin tones for soft, supple skin

To use as a sunscreen for face, apply gel-cream generously and evenly on face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply moisturizer at least every two hours and use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating

1.7-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Fragrance Free Daily Facial Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 50 is non-greasy, non-comedogenic, hypoallergenic and free of fragrances, dyes, parabens, mineral oil and oxybenzone
body.description: Protect and nourish your skin with Neutrogena Hydro Boost SPF 50 Hyaluronic Acid Facial Moisturizer - the perfect self-care addition to your skin care routine. This hydrating moisturizer is clinically proven to provide all-day moisture for soft, smooth skin while offering broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection with SPF 50 Helioplex sunscreen for face. Its lightweight, non-greasy formula is invisible on all skin tones and ideal for use under makeup, delivering radiant-looking skin in just 1 week. Infused with hyaluronic acid, glycerin, and supercharged antioxidants like vitamin E, this face moisturizer deeply hydrates and soothes dry skin. It's fragrance-free, non-comedogenic, hypoallergenic, dye-free, paraben-free, mineral oil-free, and oxybenzone-free, making it suitable for all normal/combo, dry and oily skin. Pair with Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Face Serum for 5x the hydrating power* (*based on the hydrating ingredients of the Hydro Boost HA moisturizer alone)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Southern Sunshield Perfection!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Living in the sunny South, finding the ideal daily moisturizer is a perpetual quest. The Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Facial Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 50 has not only met but exceeded all my expectations, making it an absolute must-have in my skincare arsenal.This daily water gel moisturizer is a game-changer for those who want their skincare routine to be a breeze. The infusion of hyaluronic acid provides a burst of hydration, leaving my skin feeling plump and nourished without any heaviness. The gel texture is light and absorbs like a dream, making it perfect for the hot and humid Southern climate.The addition of SPF 50 is a godsend. It's an effortless way to incorporate sun protection into my routine without the need for an additional step. The broad-spectrum coverage ensures that my skin is shielded from the harsh Southern sun, and the lightweight formula doesn't leave behind a greasy residue.Fragrance-free is the way to be, and this moisturizer nails it. I appreciate the absence of overpowering scents, making it suitable for even the most sensitive skin. It's a refreshing departure from other products that can sometimes be overwhelming.The 1.7 fl. oz size is perfect for daily use and travel-friendly, ensuring my skin stays pampered wherever I go. The packaging is not only practical but also sleek, adding a touch of sophistication to my skincare routine.In summary, the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Facial Moisturizer with SPF 50 is a Southern skincare dream. It combines hydration, sun protection, and ease of use in one fabulous package. If you're in search of a moisturizer that keeps your skin supple, protected, and Southern-sun ready, look no further. This product has rightfully earned its place as my go-to daily moisturizer, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking the perfect blend of hydration and sun defense. It's a Southern skincare essential that I wouldn't want to be without!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this product
reviews.reviewText: This product is exceptional. It is the perfect sunscreen for daily use. It goes on your face without any white cast, rubs in completely and once absorbed into your skin (within seconds) you don't feel it on any more. So hydrating and so comfortable that it makes you want to put it on everyday. Remember, sunscreen is the most important anti-aging component of any skin care routine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super hydrating, but seems like it makes me break out a bit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great daytime moisturizer for dry, sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: I'm totally impressed by this stuff. I have dry, extremely sensitive skin due to topical acne product treatment. Most moisturizers aren't moisturizing enough for me, and usually leave my skin dry/flaking by the end of the day. If they are moisturizing enough and have an spf, they are super greasy/oily and make my face feel gross. I loved the other hydroboost moisturizer (Cityshield 25 SPF), but it started to sting when applied about a week after use and wasn't hydrating enough for me.This one is fantastic! It's more of a lightweight lotion than a gel. It does feel oily/sunscreeny when initially applied, but after 5-10 minutes when it's absorbed into my skin that feeling is completely gone. My skin is soft, hydrated, and protected from the sun. Even though it's lightweight, it really is deeply moisturizing even for my dry skin and I don't say that lightly. This product has no fragrance and thus, well, smells kind of like SPF and glue but that's fine with me. Fragrances irritate my skin anyway so it's perfect. The bottle is tiny, but I only need a very tiny amount to cover my whole face so I expect it to last for a month or two with daily use. Absolutely would recommend trying this out if you have dry/combination skin (my skin still does get oily in places and this moisturizer does a pretty good job at mattifying when it's needed).UPDATE: 2 months later and I LOVE this stuff even more. I'm still on my first bottle (which is mostly full) so it really does last a long time. And the sun protection can't be beat. I was out for a 6 hour day in the sun and had this stuff on my face and I wasn't burned, which is incredible. The rest of me? Toasted to a crisp because I hadn't applied anything at all. This is legit the best summer moisturizer ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This SPF lotion provides the ideal level of moisturizing benefits to the face, without leaving the skin greasy. It layers very well under makeup, and provides a dewy look that makes skin look healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent everyday face sunscreen
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I need sunscreen everyday due to medicines. I was hoping for more of a face lotion feel, but it definitely has a little bit of that greasy sunscreen feel. I will definitely still use it, and it's perfect to fit in my purse for when I forget to put it on and I'm out and about, but may not purchase again if I can find something with a better feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I usually use prestige brands, but during Amazon Prime day I went a little ADD in my search. I came across this moisturizer in search of a gel, my skin is somewhat oily. I am very pleased, I use it in a day it's very lightweight I feel hydrated and an affordable price for a good product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars no white cast!
reviews.reviewText: I like this sunscreen very much. No scent, no white cast at all and very lightweight on the skin. I was surprised and pleased that it is also very moisturizing.It was easy to apply and it was easily absorbed into the skin after about ten minutes.Definitely going to purchase more.Extremely pleased with my purchase.
Bueno para pieles secas, hidrata bien.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sunscreen that you don’t feel like wearing.
reviews.reviewText: The best sunscreen, not sticky. Very difficult to find, so I am happy it is available in amazon

reviews.reviewTitle: Si hidrata y protege muy bien la piel
reviews.reviewText: Me gusto, es un buen protector solar hidratante, es ligero, huele bien, no es grasoso, no deja la piel blanca, lastima que le subieron mucho el precio
